did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Financial records, photographs, a manuscript, drawing, and microfilm.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Record book of business accounts, 1882-1927; photograph album of designs; and an address on church architecture, December 3, 1891, and cartoons for the windows of Emmanuel Episcopal Church in La Grange, Illinois.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University Class of 1880. John Neal Tilton,was an architect.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Record book of business accounts, 1882-1927; photograph album of designs, an address on church architecture, December 3, 1891.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John Neal Tilton. Items, #3407. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box, one map case item, and one reel of microfilm. Online guide unavailable.
